name: Karaokeyboard-2014
description:
This is a Karaokeyboard game, created for the "Godot Stereotypically Winter Holiday Game Jam 2014".

Lyrics falls from the sky, and you have to press matching letters on your keyboard in rhythm to make points, and to make the computer sing !

There are 5 levels of difficulty, from novice to master.

If you play this game while connected to the internet, you'll have access to the "Hiscores tables" to record your best scores online and to compare them with other players around the web.
